ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: while Allah is encircling them from behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But God surrounds them from all sides.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Allah is after them, has them surrounded.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Allah encompasses them from behind!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah encompasses them on every side.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and God is behind them, encompassing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Allah, all unseen, surroundeth them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God encompasses them from all sides.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Whereas Allah is, from behind them, Encompassing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and Allah besieges them from all around.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But Allah doth encompass them from behind!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Allah encompasses them from behind! (i.e. all their deeds are within His Knowledge, and He will requite them for their deeds).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah encompasses them all from behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And God encloses them from beyond.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: While Allah encompasses them from behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [85:20]   and God is behind them, All-Encompassing — they have no protector against Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Allah, all unseen, surroundeth them) He says: He is Aware of them and of their works.
